text: Virgile Pinson (born 22 February 1996) is a French professional footballer who plays as a forward. ==Career== Pinson is a youth product of Le Havre AC, joining them at 12 and playing with their youth academy for six years. On 23 April 2018, Pinson joined Stade de Reims from Antalyaspor. He made his professional debut with Reims in a 1–0 Ligue 1 loss to HSC Montpellier on 1 September 2018. ==Personal life== Pinson was born in France and is of Cameroonian descent. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Gironde Category:French footballers Category:French people of Cameroonian descent Category:Association football forwards Category:Stade de Reims players Category:Antalyaspor footballers Category:Limoges FC players Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Belgian Third Division players Category:Championnat National 2 players Category:Championnat National 3 players Category:French expatriate footballers Category:French expatriate sportspeople in Turkey Category:French expatriate sportspeople in Belgium Category:Expatriate footballers in Turkey Category:Expatriate footballers in Belgium
title: Virgile Pinson
